Text: OMG. Thank you so much! I have this on cassette, and didn't want to pay full price for a CD recording when I'd already paid out for the cassette version ages ago. Thanks. :D

You're welcome Irish Pixie.

If you want a copy of Gulda's legendary recording of the major piano concertos by Mozart they can be found here:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4985709/Mozart_-_The_Great_Piano_Concertos_-_Gulda_Abbado
